snippet: A casino chain that became an unlucky gamble for two private equity firms is re-entering the public markets.
abstract: A casino chain that became an unlucky gamble for two private equity firms is re-entering the public markets.
lead_paragraph: A casino chain that became an unlucky gamble for two private equity firms is finally re-entering the public markets.

headline.main: Caesars Prices I.P.O. at $9 a Share
